Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Angelman syndrome ( AS ) is caused by chromosome 15q11 - q13 deletions of maternal origin , by paternal uniparental disomy ( UPD ) 15 , by imprinting defects , and by mutations in the UBE3A gene .

| Angelman syndrome (AS) |
| 15q11 - q13 deletions of maternal origin |
| paternal uniparental disomy (UPD) 15 |
| imprinting defects |
| mutations in the UBE3A gene |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Disease" in the given paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Angelman syndrome (AS) |
| 15q11 - q13 deletions of maternal origin |
| mutations in the UBE3A gene |

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, "paternal uniparental disomy (UPD) 15" and "imprinting defects", do not clearly refer to a specific disease and are not included in the table.
